title: Broken placement system
body: I was placed silver 2 after my flex placements (which is appropriate imo) and now after 1 ranked loss I am silver 4 what a joke. I finished with gold 3 mmr last season, take me back to silver 2 riot what a broken system. I didn't even know until checking the forums that placements changed yet again.

replies.body: Rememeber that sites like op.gg use their own calculations, not Riot's, and thus will never accurately reflect your mmr. You ended Season 6 at S1, and placements will always put you lower than where you ended, so S4 is not an unreasonable placement. You can be placed a whole tier lower than where you ended if your mmr is not good.
